%%{IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker}}}%%
flowchart LR
    %% COLOR STYLES
    classDef clientAction fill:#90EE90,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px,color:#000
    classDef meeting fill:#87CEEB,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px,color:#000
    classDef premium fill:#FFB6C1,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px,color:#000
    classDef standard fill:#FFF,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px,color:#000
    classDef legendBox fill:#F5F5F5,stroke:#666,stroke-width:1px,color:#333

    %% LEGEND
    subgraph Legend[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
        direction TB
        LegendTitle[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]:::legendBox
        L1[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]:::clientAction
        L2[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]:::meeting
        L3[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]:::premium
        L4[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]:::standard
        LegendTitle ~~~ L1 ~~~ L2 ~~~ L3 ~~~ L4
    end

    %% STAGE 1: ONBOARDING
    subgraph Stage1[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
        direction TB
        Stage1Title[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]:::legendBox
        S1[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]:::clientAction
        S2[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]:::standard
        S3[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]:::standard
        S4[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]:::standard
        S5[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]:::clientAction
        S6[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]:::meeting
        Stage1Title ~~~ S1 --> S2 --> S3 --> S4 --> S5 --> S6
    end

    %% STAGE 2: DOCUMENT PREP
    subgraph Stage2[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
        direction TB
        Stage2Title[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]:::legendBox
        S7[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]:::standard
        S8[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]:::standard
        S9[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]:::clientAction
        S10[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]:::standard
        S11[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]:::standard
        S12[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]:::standard
        S13[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]:::meeting
        Stage2Title ~~~ S7 --> S8 --> S9 --> S10 --> S11 --> S12 --> S13
    end

    %% STAGE 3: FINALIZATION
    subgraph Stage3[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
        direction TB
        Stage3Title[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]:::legendBox
        S14[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]:::premium
        S15[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]:::premium
        S16[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]:::premium
        S17[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]:::standard
        S18[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]:::standard
        S19[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]:::meeting
        S20[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]:::premium
        S21[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]:::standard
        Stage3Title ~~~ S14 --> S15 --> S16 --> S17 --> S18 --> S19 --> S20 --> S21
    end

    %% CONNECT STAGES
    Legend -.-> Stage1
    Stage1 ==> Stage2 ==> Stage3
